cell.text: How informed are you about the increase of greenhouse gases in the atmosphere?
I have never heard of this
I have heard about this but I would not be able to explain what it is really about
I know something about this and could explain the general issue
I am familiar with this and I would be able to explain this well

statement.text: The Table describe about the increase of greenhouse gases in the atmosphere.
I know something about this and could explain the general issue will have Highest N percentage.
I have never heard of this will have High N percentage.
I know something about this and could explain the general issue will have Lowest N percentage.
